tool_description: RChilli Document Converter ​API ​converts any document into another type of document​ ​​like pdf to doc or doc to pdf.
name: RChilli Document Converter
title: RChilli Document Converter

api_list.name: RChilli Document Converter
api_list.description:
RChilli Document Converter API converts any document resume into another type of document.
The API will return the converted document in the base 64 data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rchilli-document-converter.p.rapidapi.com/documentConversion"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rchilli-document-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
